instructions:
This is the official Alien RPG Roll20 character sheet. It includes drag and drop integration with the [Alien RPG Compendium](https://app.roll20.net/compendium/Alien%20RPG).
If you see any bugs or require support, follow the instructions below to submit a help ticket:
1. Follow [this link](https://support.metamorphic-digital.com/)
2. Click the Roll20 icon
3. Select "Free League Publishing"
3. Select "Alien"
